body_html:
Having
http://developer.download.nvidia.com/compute/cuda/repos/ubuntu1704/x86_64
in source.list and issuing
sudo apt install cuda-toolkit-9-0
will solve the issue to 18.04 installation too (with outdated lib of course).
body_text:
Having
http://developer.download.nvidia.com/compute/cuda/repos/ubuntu1704/x86_64
in source.list and issuing
sudo apt install cuda-toolkit-9-0
will solve the issue to 18.04 installation too (with outdated lib of course).
body:
Having 
`http://developer.download.nvidia.com/compute/cuda/repos/ubuntu1704/x86_64` 
in source.list and issuing
`sudo apt install cuda-toolkit-9-0`
will solve the issue to 18.04 installation too (with outdated lib of course).
